sentences.en: a sincere attempt to resolve the problem
sentences.cn: 解决这一问题的认真尝试

sentences.en: All the well-meant, sincere advice is largely wasted on him.
sentences.cn: 他对所有善意、真挚的建议基本都无动于衷。

sentences.en: Every visitor noticed that her effusive welcome was not sincere.
sentences.cn: 所有的客人都看出来她那过分热情的欢迎是不真诚的.

sentences.en: He is sincere and easy to get along with.
He ladles out compliments to everyone, but he's not really sincere.
sentences.cn: 他见人就大加吹捧, 但并非出于诚意.

sentences.en: He offered a sincere apology for his behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他主动对自己的行为诚恳地道了歉.
他的歉意是出自内心的.

sentences.en: His mother is a sincere Christian.
sentences.cn: 他母亲是个虔诚的基督教徒.

sentences.en: his sincere desire to find out the truth
sentences.cn: 他想查明真相的真切愿望

sentences.en: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough.
sentences.cn: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

sentences.en: I wasn’t sure that he was sincere in what he was saying.
sentences.cn: 我不敢肯定他说的话是真心诚意的。

sentences.en: Permit me to offer you my sincere congratulations.

sentences.cn: 请接受我们诚挚的慰唁.

sentences.en: Primo de Rivera himself was a benevolent and sincere paternalist.
sentences.cn: 普里莫·德里韦拉本人是个仁慈而真诚的家长式人物。

sentences.en: She is sincere in her political beliefs.
sentences.cn: 她忠实于自己的政治信仰.

sentences.en: There was a sincere expression of friendliness on both their faces.
sentences.cn: 他们俩的脸上都流露出真挚友好的表情。

sentences.en: We must never be unworthy of our teachers'untiring and sincere teachings.
sentences.cn: 我们决不要辜负老师的谆谆教导.

trans.tran_cn: 真诚的，诚挚的，〈古〉纯粹的，不掺假的，真心实意的，真实的
trans.tran_en: a feeling, belief, or statement that is sincere is honest and true, and based on what you really feel and believe
